titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-238, by Mr. Sessions.

Resolution applies to any resolution reported on the legislative day of September 29, 2005, providing for consideration or disposition of a conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2360) making appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2006, and for other purposes

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 96.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 897, H. Res. 468 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: 9/28/2005--Reported to House without amendment. Waives a specified requirement of rule XIII to provide for consideration or disposition of the conference report on H.R. 2360 (FY2006 Department of Homeland Security appropriations).
